h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Mount Lingtai Seedlings Location
content: The Mount Lingtai Seedlings can be found in Woods of Ember at the Camp of Seasons Shrine in the Flaming Mountains. From the Shrine, cross the bridge and follow the path to the left. Along the next bridge and past the large tree, you can find the Soak sitting in the gazebo at the top of the hill.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mount_Lingtai_Seedlings.md', within the main section titled 'Mount Lingtai Seedlings', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Mount Lingtai Seedlings Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Mount Lingtai Seedlings can be found in Woods of Ember at the Camp of Seasons Shrine in the Flaming Mountains. From the Shrine, cross the bridge and follow the path to the left. Along the next bridge and past the large tree, you can find the Soak sitting in the gazebo at the top of the hill.
